website_summaries.verdict: The sleek design and pre-filled spice jars make this rack the perfect choice for beginner cooks.
pros: Both the metal strip and the spice jars have a modern, sleek design
The 6 tins come already filled with spices
We love that the company also offers 5-years of free spice refills
The metal strip attaches easily to the fridge or cupboard with the included adhesive tape and screws
Magnets can hold even heavier spices with no down sliding
cons: While the lids do close tightly, they are not airtight

customer_reviews.title: Seems very cheap. The metal is discolored in some ...
customer_reviews.text: Seems very cheap. The metal is discolored in some areas and has a rough finish. The clear plastic on the lid is very thin and cheap. (Like they were punched from the plastic of a 2 liter soda bottle). I bought these originally to store spices, but I would not store any sort of food product in such a low production quality item.
customer_reviews.author: The Technological Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Stainless Steel 5-Tin Magnet
customer_reviews.text: Love this product Installed on the wall in my RV kitchen. The tins stays in place even while traveling on rough roads. I had to place a mark on the opening on the box to show where the opening is when turning the lid.
customer_reviews.author: E Gail

customer_reviews.title: Motorhome spices
customer_reviews.text: We installed this on the kitchen wall in our RV and love it! The spices never fell while driving or even budged for that matter. Great sleek design and was happy to see that it even came with spices!
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: Don't recommend
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was a perfect solution for my RV. Turns out the glue strips only randomly stick to the wall. Then the magnetic strips pulled away from all of the metal! I have had to remove and replace ALL of the glue strips in order to make this work. Then once you use them a few times the powder spices get into the grooves of the lid and make it very difficult to turn open/close. Good idea, poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: Annabelle Fulk

customer_reviews.title: Great VALUE for your money!
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived quickly (with Amazon Prime Membership), and was packaged very securely. None of the contents of the package were damaged upon receipt. I purchased this product for space saving needs (I live in a Tiny House), and convenience. The fact that I will receive 5 years of free spice refills is an added bonus to this purchase. The contains are cute, and well made. I have placed the spice's on my fridge, and am using the magnetic strip to corral miscellaneous small items in my bathroom. Talk about great value for the money! It is like getting 2 useful items in one package! Thanks Kamenstein!
customer_reviews.author: Snitchyhaun

customer_reviews.title: Tins are ok, everything else sub-par
customer_reviews.text: I like the size of these spice tins, but the magnets are so wimpy I had to glue decent magnets on to each one. The free spices are not really free - you still have to pay for shipping. Also, check out the website that has the free spices - as long as all you cook are marinaras you should be fine, but my spice palate is much broader than that and I couldn't find anything I use frequently enough to make the shipping worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Bigfishbowl

customer_reviews.title: Good screwes and nails
customer_reviews.text: Do not waste your money. the labels look nice while on the yellow background but are useless once taped to a filled jar, you can barely read them. the cans are flimsy and the premium spices and of the lowest quality. I am used it for my small nails and screws in the garage now.
customer_reviews.author: Amnon Feiner

customer_reviews.title: Good Idea, Clean Set-up
customer_reviews.text: Just needs to be adaptable to stick on the inside of a wood cabinet door and it would be perfect. I think it is a clean and practical set-up, I just have to find the right sticker tape to keep on my cupboard door. For a magnetic surface I am sure it would stay without the fuss of tape. The cups definitely stay put and are convenient.
customer_reviews.author: American Pie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Van Conversion
customer_reviews.text: I just received mine today and I love it! It fits perfectly in my van conversion that I'm currently decorating. As I need all the space I can get in the van, this product is my favorite purchase thus far. It keeps my spices in one spot and hopefully they don't fall off while driving. After seeing several van conversions with a spice rack like this, I figured to give it a shot. I'm glad that I did. I am going to get one for my neighbor as well before we start full time traveling.
customer_reviews.author: tiffm

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected.
customer_reviews.text: I like them. They look nice, and are larger than I thought they would be. The lids are a little tough to get on and off sometimes. But they are good quality. I already have mega spice racks in my kitchen I actually bought these for vitamins to get them off my counter and they work rather spectacularly for that purpose I think! I ordered two. One I got a great price on an amazon lightening deal.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: I now own three of these. They seal up tight and keep things fresh. They magnets are sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Orion Nights

customer_reviews.title: Magnetic container
customer_reviews.text: Very good product! Purchased for misc item needed in my camper and it works great!
customer_reviews.author: cindyf 501

customer_reviews.title: Happy with it. 👍
customer_reviews.text: Storage I believe hold about 8 oz.. Might be less. Super sturdy, dropped them a lot and they don't pop off or twist off 👍 have "installed" them just using the magnet. Strong though. If needed, i'd buy again. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Conrad H

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic buy
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great buy I might have to give them as stocking stuffers this year. So clean looking and great for small storage everywhere, from the kitchen, kid's rooms, garage and office.
customer_reviews.author: shopper

customer_reviews.title: The tins themself are fine, but if you are purchasing this because it ...
customer_reviews.text: The tins themself are fine, but if you are purchasing this because it comes with spices and 5 years of refills, don't waste your time. The spices they sent are the most obscure things I've ever heard of and will probably never use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Concept is great, execution is poor
customer_reviews.text: When I first received these, I was delighted at their appearance and function. However, after time I've found that they just can't be used for all spices. Due to their inferior production, they are far from air tight. This then allows moister (humidity) to enter the containers causing powder-based spices to clump. Only herb-like spices work fine; my garlic and onion powders (for example) are hard balls and cannot be used. I'm very disappointed in this product.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of them to stick on my fridge. They look really nice and are very easy to set-up. Spices are not the best but that is to be expected. Nice that they give you a 5 year supply of the 6 spices for free. I'll just buy the brand I like and fill them up. Will also purchase the labels from here, pack of 100. They supply labels but not for the most common spices which is ok. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: AuRebel

customer_reviews.title: Handy spice rack
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item as recommended by a friend. We hang it on the hood of our motorhome to keep everyday spices handy and to free up space in the cabinets.
customer_reviews.author: David H. Gundersen

customer_reviews.title: Stale spices
customer_reviews.text: kind of pretty, but the spices are old and tasteless. You'll end up throwing the spices away and buying fresh ones.
customer_reviews.author: Ernie Banks

customer_reviews.title: I bought two and love the sift and pour lid
customer_reviews.text: I can't wait to install these. I bought two and love the sift and pour lid. These will look great on the wall of the kitchen. They came with spices and labels. I can't wait to try some of the interesting flavors.
customer_reviews.author: CShade

customer_reviews.text: Put it on the range hood in the afternoon when I woke up the next day everything was on the floor the only thing that was still attached was the magnet. Not good unless you actually screw it on to something. I ordered 2 when I opened the box one was fine but the other one was beat up. The metal plate was bend in 3 different places and some of the canisters have dents. I was very disappointed. But they do look nice screwed in the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Karina martinez

customer_reviews.title: You have to get one!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love the concept. The tons are great and magnets strong. And the spices....amen...are MADE IN THE USA! For that reason...I'm a customer for life. Thank you. Loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Bobbi Myers

customer_reviews.title: I loved something similar so much in my kitchen
customer_reviews.text: I loved something similar so much in my kitchen, I bought 2 of these for my guest apartment. Lots of compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Tania

customer_reviews.title: Kamenstein 6-Canister Spice Rack
customer_reviews.text: I really LOVE this. I have limited counter space and cabinet space, so this was a wonderful solution. I have it hanging on the wall above the top of my stove where I can get to my spices easily as I cook. These would work great too hanging on your fridge if you didn't want to hang the metal strip on a wall.
customer_reviews.author: Cabin Lady

customer_reviews.title: Stylish but not functional.
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of this product but the canisters did not meet expectations. 2 of the canister lids jam so bad I cannot get the lids turned or off to use them.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlin Fulk

customer_reviews.title: they are prone to denying Ana the magnets could be better, but otherwise perfect
customer_reviews.text: Bought 3, they are prone to denying Ana the magnets could be better, but otherwise perfect.
customer_reviews.author: sporting road

customer_reviews.title: I use a couple of these to store loose leaf ...
customer_reviews.text: I use a couple of these to store loose leaf teas on my fridge. Overall, very convenient. My only complaint is that the lids will sometimes stick, as if slightly bent out of shape. I have had to wrench them off before - which certainly can't help the problem of the thin metal losing it's circular shape...
customer_reviews.author: L.H.

customer_reviews.title: The magnetic strip doesn’t stay adhered to the metal panel
customer_reviews.text: Whatever glue they are using to stick the magnet to the metal strip is not strong enough. Mine separated after only 1 month of use.
customer_reviews.author: Robert M. Kahn

customer_reviews.title: A MONTH to deliver!!???
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these things, I have bought them for every place i'v stayed in. BUT the original arrival date was 2 weeks after I ordered it, and now it say 'sorry' they will only be here a MONTH after I ordered. I need them tomorrow!! So grumpy. But great product, sorry to rage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the purpose of saving cabinet space
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the purpose of saving cabinet space! The only improvement I would suggest is to make the magnets a little stronger for the heavier spices. Overall good product though.
customer_reviews.author: wes

customer_reviews.title: Great Concept Poor Materials
customer_reviews.text: I actually loved my containers when I first received them. They are perfect for our kitchen and super functional. After the first 6 mos, I noticed the tins started to rust so I ordered another set as backup. Well now, I am in the same position again. Maybe a stainless steel would have been a better choice for materials. So I am going to try to order a stainless steel set from another manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: D. Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The lids on three of the five containers won't twist to dispense the contents.
customer_reviews.author: Brienne Vasquez

customer_reviews.title: Look great
customer_reviews.text: Really nice looking. They don't come with enough stickers, and I didn't realize the came with spices, so now I have way more than I ever need of some spices I never use. I'll probably sharpie labels on them.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: all spiced up
customer_reviews.text: I loaded them up with my most used spices and could smell the aroma through out the kitchen. I may need another set.Is it the time of year(Christmas) or more needed different spices?
customer_reviews.author: Cardmen E. Gee

customer_reviews.title: good looking but not the greatest quality
customer_reviews.text: I cut myself pretty deeply on an unfinished edge while washing these out before I poured my spices into them, and then they rusted out as they were air drying. So I switched to hand drying and one of the pieces of plastic on the top popped off. Needless to say, not the greatest quality item. However, they are doing their job and looking lovely. I just hope those aforementioned incidents were the last of the spice rack drama.
customer_reviews.author: boboskiwat

customer_reviews.title: Good looking unit
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasently surprised with the a amount of spice got with the canisters. The only downfall is the magnet is pretty weak. It hold them up with could use a bit more pull
customer_reviews.author: Paxinbel

customer_reviews.title: Enjoy the convenience more than I can say
customer_reviews.text: Bought originally for a camper need, and ended up with a second for the home. Enjoy the convenience more than I can say. And the company has wonderful customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! Purchased for RV love these great magnet and ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect ! Purchased for RV love these great magnet and looks perfect
customer_reviews.author: Katherin

customer_reviews.title: Good for small spaces
customer_reviews.text: I have a small contemporary condo and this allow great use of space under the cabinets. Great product, great price.
customer_reviews.author: BoiseB

customer_reviews.title: Easy Breezy
customer_reviews.text: These spice cans come with free spices for 5 years. They have clear stickers that say the name of the spice. You twist the lid to shake or pour the spices. You will want more than 6 though ;)
customer_reviews.author: MzFancyPantz2u

customer_reviews.title: Pretty function
customer_reviews.text: Function ok and save lots of counter space. The lids have plastic insert which doesn't seal well on all cans. One can out of 20 arrived dented
customer_reviews.author: AlwaysHaveAnOpinion

customer_reviews.title: Free spices for 5 years! - - NOT
customer_reviews.text: As others have noted, they are chintzy. I have other Kamenstein stuff that is more substantial. The spices included were Crushed Mint .28 oz., Celery Salt 1.98 oz., Basil .50 oz., Pizza Seasoning .54 oz., Bay Leaves .50 oz., and Marjoram .18 oz..When I went on line to register for the free spice refills, I got the shock I was half-way expecting. So-called "shipping and handling" varied from $5.25 for 1-4 bags up to $10.00 for 5-10 bags. So, the "free" cost to replace the tiny bags (6) included would be $10.00. Some free replacement, huh?
customer_reviews.author: Walter Roland Hyatt, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Cool Set
customer_reviews.text: My wife does a lot of cooking. And got tired of always looking in the cabinet for spices. She loves these!!!
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made
customer_reviews.text: The have opaque flimsy plastic lids. the magnets are weak and fall of the the refrigerator. I regret this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne

customer_reviews.title: rack em up
customer_reviews.text: the magnets are weak so it doesn't stay put like you would expect it too. As a result it will not work in our RV kitchen... BOO
customer_reviews.author: Richard Summers

customer_reviews.title: ... warrant one (such as cilantro) but the tins are great.
customer_reviews.text: It's missing some labels for spices I would think are common enough to warrant one (such as cilantro) but the tins are great.
customer_reviews.author: J. ROMAN

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: I got this spice rack for my fiance for Christmas and he absolutely loved it. He immediately put it up on his fridge, although he did use a lot his own spices rather than the ones that came with it to make it more colorful. We tried to wash it before putting the spices in, but the lids seem to trap water that we couldn't figure out how to get out, so be careful.
customer_reviews.author: MDShell

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I found a much better deal at Costco, therefore I feel the price was too high.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Howard

customer_reviews.title: Great for small spaces
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I live in a studio apartment and have very little space. I definitely recommend this to anybody with a small kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: gdelpino

customer_reviews.title: Simple & Attractive
customer_reviews.text: We just added two new sets of these to our collection -- now at four. They're great for our kitchen, matching our stainless steal refrigerator and oven and helping conserve counter space. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Friedrich

customer_reviews.title: Great space-saving product
customer_reviews.text: I have very limited storage space in my kitchen. These spice containers each hold a good amount of spice and have easy access pour or sprinkle holes on the side. All you have to do is twist the cap. Holds firmly to my refrigerator no problem. I keep them on the side of the frig next to my stove for convenience.
customer_reviews.author: K. Shinn

customer_reviews.title: Save space!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter who moved in to an apartment with a small kitchen. She LOVES it! Great space saving idea- just keep the magnetic spice jars on the side of your refrigerator!
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to help organize my spices. Loved it so much that I bought another.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Blackwood

customer_reviews.title: Its perfect.. only I notice it's hard to open ...
customer_reviews.text: Its perfect .. only I notice it's hard to open with black pepper
customer_reviews.author: Reham samy

customer_reviews.title: Looks great - clean and sleek
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product. I bought 3 of these and placed them on my kitchen wall all together, one on top of the other, just above my counter top and below the cabinets next to the stove. The look great and work great. I really only bought them for the magnetic strip and containers but the spices they come with are a bonus. I do wish that they would provide you with some blank labels though so that you could write/make your own. Maybe that exists but I haven't looked for it yet. I also saw the canisters (but not the strip) at bed, bath, & beyond so if you ever need extras - they sell them there individually.
customer_reviews.author: S. Gillett

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to save space in my very small kitchen. I loved it so much I bought two more. The only reason for the four star review is that it comes with adhesive strips and no instructions. I initially thought I could use the adhesive strips to mount it to the wall, but that was a no-go. You definitely need to mount it with the included screws in order for it to stay. All in all a great product!!
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: attractive and functional
customer_reviews.text: bought to replace a set i bought about 10 years ago. great product, but will begin to rust eventually and glue used to attach magnets eventually gave out. could have just re-glued magnets on, but with the rust it was just easier to replace, got my money's worth and they look and function great.
customer_reviews.author: R. Kleinman

customer_reviews.title: GREAT for small spaces!
customer_reviews.text: The little magnetic containers are perfect for my tiny little kitchen. We bought the first set, and my fiance filled up the containers with the included spices. Then I bought three more sets so we can empty the spice rack to make room for other things in the cabinet. We pitched the included spices in the next order. Labels are included for the spices packaged with the set. We'll have to use our own label-maker for the rest of our collection. The containers stick to any magnetic surface, of course. We're using the magnetic strip just because I like the looks of it. Nice clean lines with simple circular containers. Magnetic strip sticks to magnetic surfaces, too. LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Neat idea but product came apart first day
customer_reviews.text: Looks neat and modern but back plate came loose from magnet within 12 hours and all spice containers ended up on the floor. Giving it two stars because not a total waste as the containers themselves can be used on metal surface.
customer_reviews.author: Fast Reader

customer_reviews.title: Kinda a cool. Kinda Techy
customer_reviews.text: Kinda a cool. Kinda Techy. They are full sized metal spice cans, that have a built in shaker in the lid. The tops are clear, so you can see the spices in them. They have printed decals that can be attached to the clear tops. Spices are packaged separately and they were very fresh smelling. The rack has magnetic holders, so they can go on the wall or under a cabinet. Two sheetrock screws included
customer_reviews.author: Mac_Cat

customer_reviews.title: Is perfect for kid's bathroom too
customer_reviews.text: This works great in my daughter's bathroom for pony tail holders, bobby pins, small bows, q-tips, etc.
customer_reviews.author: NewMom1

customer_reviews.title: Super Love These!
customer_reviews.text: These look great and work like a charm! I ended up ordering 5 rows of these! The stickers they send aren't enough, I ordered a bigger set to get all 24 labeled. UPDATE: There are 3 out of the 30 that I can no longer twist open, so I can't even use them.... :(
customer_reviews.author: Islandgirl19

customer_reviews.title: Great way to store spices in a small kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Great way to store spices in a small kitchen, and it looks cool too! I did not use the metal backing, instead, I stuck the canisters on the side of my fridge. If the labels for your spices are not included, there are several other inexpensive sets you can order on amazon. The only issue is that the canisters can be a bit tough to open, and they are not 100% airtight. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: saw these on Rachael Ray
customer_reviews.text: I saw ones ''like this'' on the Racheal Ray show. But let me tell ya, if ya buy anything with her name on it your paying way too much ! These are very nice, look great, easy to use, not expensive and you dont even need the magnetic back plate they come with unless your putting it on the wall. I pop my containers right on the side of my frig ! Easy reach while cooking and no more cluttered cabnets! love these and would recommend them to anyone. michelle
customer_reviews.author: michelle Lee

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for RV
customer_reviews.text: I bought this spice rack to use in an RV. It was easy to install, and the magnet is strong. It looks great. The clear lids are plastic, but I like that they're lightweight. This is a great space saver. Excellent quality.
customer_reviews.author: Mara

customer_reviews.title: Love these. I got 3
customer_reviews.text: Love these. I got 3. I was surprised to find that they come with metal strip that you can nail or tape on the wall, and labels,which is a bonus. I initially had a plan to have them under one of the cabinets but then I just put them on the refrigerator door and love them. I'm about to get more later.
customer_reviews.author: lucio

customer_reviews.title: Amazing all in one
customer_reviews.text: One of the best things I have bought on Amazon! These are nice tins can be used to store a variety of things they ship with a backing and six steel tins with a clear top. They also come with labels and spices and mounting hardware and spice refills for five years free.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: I just remodeled by kitchen and it looks so nice on the wall
customer_reviews.text: So cute! I just remodeled by kitchen and it looks so nice on the wall. I just wish they had given you a variety of different "colored" herbs instead of just green. Of course you can pot whatever you like but it would be nice visually if there was more variety
customer_reviews.author: B Connor

customer_reviews.title: This thing is the best, I loved it so much I got one ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is the best, I loved it so much I got one for my mom. I've had it for about 4 years and one of the magnets came unglued from the canister but I glued it back on and it works great again. So much easier having your spices out when you cook than hidden away in the back of a cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: DeeDee86

customer_reviews.title: Won't recommend
customer_reviews.text: Rusted in less than 1 month. I would not recommend. Look for plastic containers with magnets ... This will rust unavoidabely.
customer_reviews.author: Liber Fernández

customer_reviews.title: Love this so much
customer_reviews.text: Love this so much, I bought two! I am not hanging it anywhere because I have bad luck with that sort of thing (the two-sided sticky foam), but they look awesome, are the perfect size for the product I have stored in them, and I like the little spouts so you can easily pour from each canister.
customer_reviews.author: sekhmet

customer_reviews.title: Spice Rack
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for gifts for Christmas. One for my grand daughter and one for her mother. They both like them a lot.They have them stuck on the sides of their refrigerators within easy reach of their stoves. I filled them with the spices and or herbs that are my most used and they were a nice gift.
customer_reviews.author: Deb Pelton

customer_reviews.title: Ehh
customer_reviews.text: Spice rack is convenient and easy to put up, just doesn't come with any hardware besides some cheap 2-sided tape. You can go to your local hardware store and get some screws. Other than that the canisters are great and hold really well on the magnet.
customer_reviews.author: Mallory

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for small kitchens, I've had it on my wall and on my refrigerator. Makes organizing easy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these. LOVE!!
customer_reviews.text: Love Love Love Love! Only wish you could see the labels better. A White lettering would be a better idea here i think
customer_reviews.author: Deborah D

customer_reviews.title: Love these spice jars!
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for these for quite some time. they have a slim profile which makes hanging them on a wall in my small kitchen a definite plus! The only thing I don't like about them is the cling labels are printed in black. considering most of your spices are dark, it's hard to read the label.
customer_reviews.author: iguanagirl

customer_reviews.title: I have not tried the spices that came along but I do like the labels they also provided
customer_reviews.text: These tins stick anywhere! on the hood of my fan over the stove & refrigerator without the magnetic strip being drilled into the wall. I have not tried the spices that came along but I do like the labels they also provided.
customer_reviews.author: Monique

customer_reviews.title: Great for craft room!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use in my craft room, I have push pins, safety pins, paper clips, sewing pins, and magnets in mine. I love the look of it! I would definitely buy this again!
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: This is SO wonderful for our camper - love them
customer_reviews.text: This is SO wonderful for our camper - love them! Plus you can turn the cap & use it as a shaker!
customer_reviews.author: Shelley

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and strong magnet
customer_reviews.text: Looks great. Magnets are very strong. I placed 5 of them in a wall (one next to the other) and they look amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Efficient storage
customer_reviews.text: These magnets work just the way I needed them to on their own. I have limited counter and cabinet space so these little guys were a great way to create storage in a small space; I use them to hold loose leaf tea as well as spices. I did not use the magnetic bar they came with but I was very happy to see the coupon cope for 5 years of unlimited spice refills!
customer_reviews.author: E. Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: What a great product.
customer_reviews.text: Everyone that see these ask what they are. When I show them they're blown away. What a great product.
customer_reviews.author: chessie

customer_reviews.title: Seem's kind of cheap
customer_reviews.text: There's a magnet on the back of the rack that does not hold its weight very well, and the magnet looked like a 6 year old had used hot glue to glue it on, it is nice however that the magnet comes off so eaily so that it could be screwed into the wall, the metal rack itself is pretty nice as are the jars, overall its enough to keep your spices organized and looking good
customer_reviews.author: Graham B

customer_reviews.title: Loved these
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for storing spices! Of course, most of us need more than 6! The magnet and the sifters on the side really make this product shine for that purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Love this spice rack.
customer_reviews.text: Great spice rack for our RV. Space saver when you don't have a lot of storage.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Wixom

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and sturdy!!! Bought for my hubbie to use for his nuts and bolts in garage... no more hunting for right screw. Very sturdy!!!!! Ordering 3 more
customer_reviews.author: Hazel G.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these! They work so well I ordered more.
customer_reviews.author: Britney Lynn McCollum

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Work great! Exactly what I expected even has extra labels. 10/10 would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I put this in my trailer and they stay on even through the bumpy roads.
customer_reviews.author: Shellie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome spice rack
customer_reviews.text: Awesome spice rack! Not only does the magnetic strip function well for storing spice but refills are a great idea!
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Great size!
customer_reviews.text: Put them on the side of my fridge instead of the wall. They look great! Magnets are strong and stick well.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. and Mrs. M

customer_reviews.title: Kamenstein 6-Canister Magnetic-Strip Spice Rack
customer_reviews.text: At first thought it wasn't what I wanted-- but have gotten used to it and actually am glad that I bought it. Fits perfectly on the stove-- and even have room for other things.
customer_reviews.author: quinne@juno.com

customer_reviews.title: great spice containers
customer_reviews.text: an gift for my daughter in-law. she will enjoy using the 2 spice racks i ordered in her kitchen. magnetic spice containers was on her xmas list..
customer_reviews.author: DIY'er

customer_reviews.title: wonderful space saver
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this product as I have a very tiny kitchen with little too no counter or cabinet space.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Canisters
customer_reviews.text: I love these. Very cool. Nice way to store and display your spices while keeping them within easy reach. All of these type canisters do seem to be on the pricey side however. Still deserves 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Earth Spirits

customer_reviews.title: It is magnetic
customer_reviews.text: Item was similar to expected. Magnetic surface held canister firmly to the stove refrigerater and enclosed steel strip that I mounted on the wall. The lids were a bit flimsier than expected with a light plastic rather than glass. The spouts work well and the prepackaged labels were that static cling material that you find with window decals. Tossed them as soon as we opened the package because they looked kind of tacky.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good! The cover gets stuck, not rotate and not opens
customer_reviews.author: Damian Ribeiro

customer_reviews.title: They seem to work well
customer_reviews.text: They work well. Maybe could use a slightly stronger magnet though
customer_reviews.author: JSGIT

customer_reviews.title: very convenient, but they don't last
customer_reviews.text: These are very convenient and I like them better than having tons of bottles all over my pantry. One drawback, they tend to rust in humid weather.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: We've had these for 2-3 years. I love the concept, and they are very handy. However, they are not built to last. I have 4 strips, and today am having to epoxy the magnets back onto all but 4 containers. The magnetic strips have also separated from the metal backing.
customer_reviews.author: Laura R.

product_meta.title: Kamenstein 31106 6-Tin Stainless Steel Magnetic Strip Spice Rack with Free Spice Refills for 5 Years, ,
product_meta.description: Size:6-TinThis Kamenstein magnetic spice rack can be placed almost anywhere - use the magnetic strip to place it on your refrigerator or mount it to your kitchen wall with screws (screws not included). The six round canisters (with magnets on the back) attach to the metal bar, offering quick access to your favorite spices. Also use to store and organize, art and craft supplies, paper clips, spare change, screws, rubber bands, push pins, buttons, candy, bobby pins, hair ties....anything! Canisters have a twist top lid that slides open for sprinkling and pouring. Includes basil, coriander, marjoram, crushed mint, bay leaves and pizza seasoning (spice labels not included). All spices and spice jars are filled and sealed for freshness in Kamenstein's facility in Winchendon, Massachusetts, which is licensed and inspected by the Commonwealth of Massachusetts, Department of Public Health, Division of Food & Drugs. This facility is inspected by the U.S. Food and Drug Administration. Purchase this spice rack and receive Free Spice Refills for 5 years you pay only shipping and handling per order (Shipping prices: 1-10 bags $10.00, 11-20 bags $17.50, 21-30 bags $22.00, 31-45 bags $32.00, 46-60 bags $42.00 & 61-75 bags $52.00). Spices are packed due to availability at the time of packing.
feature_bullets: FREE SPICE REFILLS FOR 5 YEARS: This product is eligible for 5 years of free spice refills of all the spices that come with this spice rack; see packaging for more details
VERSATILE STORAGE AND DISPLAY OPTIONS: The strip-style rack can be mounted to any metal surface or be hung on the wall. (SCREWS NOT INCLUDED)
EASY TO VIEW STORAGE JARS: Each of the 3-ounce storage jars has a convenient see-through sift or pour lid; jar labels are also included.

VERSATILE AND USE FOR OTHER STORAGE NEEDS: The Kamenstein Stainless Steel Magnetic Strip can also be used to store and organize arts and crafts supplies, paper clips, spare change screws, rubber bands, push pins, buttons, and candy. The options are endless.
SEALED FOR FRESHNESS IN THE USA: All spices and spice jars are filled and sealed for freshness in Kamenstein' s own FDA-approved and monitor facility in Winchendon, Massachusetts, U.S.A
